dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: I need to go to the Bakery and help uncle.

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: (whisper) Huh? Who is that person outside?

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: Should I sleep? Or ask that person?

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: I hope that I'm only daydreaming. I should get to sleep and rest.

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: Yesterday felt different. Did I really see someone?

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: I should just get to the bakery.

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: I should watch some news before going to bed.

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: I should sleep now and tell uncle about this tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: mc
dialogue.text: Go home and get some rest.
